events.title: First Moon Landing
events.description: Apollo 11 astronauts Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin become the first humans to land on the Moon

events.title: Wright Brothers First Flight
events.description: The Wright brothers make the first controlled, sustained flight of a powered aircraft

events.title: World Wide Web Created
events.description: Tim Berners-Lee invents the World Wide Web at CERN

events.title: Declaration of Independence
events.description: The United States Declaration of Independence is adopted by the Continental Congress

events.title: Fall of the Berlin Wall
events.description: The Berlin Wall falls, marking a symbolic end to the Cold War
